install-metamask.title: Install Metamask
install-metamask.content: Metamask is a wallet that is used to make blockchain transactions. Click here for a guide on how to install the Metamask chrome extension.

connect-wallet.title: Connect Wallet
connect-wallet.content: We use the Polygon Mumbai Network to send transactions. Press Connect to add this network to your Metamask wallet and connect to this website. Once connected, you will see your wallet address appear in the top right corner of this page.

get-matic.title: Deposit some MATIC token to your wallet
get-matic.content: You need to pay a network fee each time you make a blockchain transaction. As previously mentioned we're using the Polygon Mumbai Network. This is a test network, so click here to get some FREE MATIC. Simply, copy your wallet address from the top of the page and paste it in the wallet address box on the Faucet website.

sign-in-with-slack.title: Sign in with Slack
sign-in-with-slack.content: We need your Slack user ID for the next step. Please press Sign in with Slack to authenticate with Slack

participate.title: Participate
participate.content: To reward you for your hard work, we need to link your Slack user ID and wallet address. Press participate, metamask will open and will ask you to confirm a transaction. Confirm the transaction and wait for the Success screen!
